amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the International Trade Administration by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the amount for Operations and Administration under the ITA by $5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wolf amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Wolf.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wolf amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
